title: Bitcoin: Bull Market May Be in Final Stages
description: Market Overview The crypto market capitalisation fell by 3.1% to $3.65 trillion during the day. The bulls failed to push the market above the recent highs of $3.95 trillion, and we are seeing the formation of an active short-term downtrend.
